alert.note: Alert for Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:32PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana and northern Pearl River Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bogalusa, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bogalusa, Poplarville, Varnado, Crossroads and Angie. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 23 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
